result.reason: This feature requires implementing a text search mechanism by extracting the session buffer (likely via the existing CopyAllToClipboard command or temporary logging) into a separate searchable window, as direct modification of the embedded PuTTY process for native search is not feasible within this repository.
result.approach: Add a 'Find in Session' option to the connection menu. This will trigger the 'Copy All to Clipboard' command on the active PuTTY instance, retrieve the text, and display it in a new modal dialog (`FrmSessionSearch`) with search/highlight functionality.
